script: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mentor ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, createdAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updatedAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, firstName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, lastName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, phoneNumber VARCHAR(255) NULL,departmentId INT,  CONSTRAINT FK_mentor_department FOREIGN KEY (departmentId) REFERENCES department(id)  );
